Provided that it is not the case that the negation of the negation of rescheduling the event implies not canceling the event leading to losing sponsors not implying maintaining reputation leading to maintaining reputation not implying facing criticism, the gallery faces criticism.
If the exhibition is not successful, then the gallery cancels the event.
